Articles.Content:
Hello,

I've just bought and installed making history and now I'm unable to use SAS to target maneuver or target/antitarget.

I can add the maneuver node, the maneuver shows up on the nav ball but I'm no longer able to target it. It just doesn't show. 

 

uninstalling the dlc fixes the problem.

 

Is there a work around for this?

 

Thank you,

 

Marcus Bentzon-Jones
That sounds weird, as if some files are garbled/corrupted. Tried a Steam file verification (assuming that you have KSP on Steam)?
Are you using a high enough level kerbal/probe core to be able to select maneuver in the first place? Try it in a sandbox save with the best probe core.
